text: Jagata svatahla motha samajalyamule ani tyancya va'ita prayatnammule ani va'ita prayatna karanaryanci siksa te prayatna karanaryannaca bhogavi lagate tara kaya he tyaca vyavaharacya pratikseta aheta, jo purvicya lokansi kela jata rahila? Tevha tumhala allahacya pad'dhatita kadhihi badala adhalanara nahi ani tumhala allahacya niyamata kadhi badala hota asalela adhalanara nahi
